h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Violet Hail Transformation Location
content: Doaist Mi can be found ing a flute past the regular Venom Daoists in the area. He will ask you to find the item he seeks, the Violet Hail (Key Item) "Violet Hail \(Key Item\)"). This can be obtained from any of the Daoists in the area. If you don't get it on your first run through, simply rest and respawn the enemies.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Violet_Hail_(Transformation).md', within the main section titled 'Violet Hail (Transformation)', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Violet Hail Transformation Location'.
The content is as follows:
Doaist Mi can be found ing a flute past the regular Venom Daoists in the area. He will ask you to find the item he seeks, the Violet Hail (Key Item) "Violet Hail \(Key Item\)"). This can be obtained from any of the Daoists in the area. If you don't get it on your first run through, simply rest and respawn the enemies.
